sentences.en: Corporate farmers are scrambling for every acre of land they can get.
sentences.cn: 各农垦公司正在争夺可能到手的每一英亩土地.

sentences.en: It is characterized by a relatively high production per tree and per acre.
sentences.cn: 它的主要标志是单株产量和单位面积产量较高.

sentences.en: One authority made a census of the spiders in a grass field in the south of England, and he estimated that there were more than 2,250,000 in one acre.
sentences.cn: 一位权威对英国南方一块草坪上的蜘蛛作过统计, 他估计每英亩有2,250,000多只蜘蛛.

sentences.en: Our house is on an acre of land which gives us a nice big backyard for our garden.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子坐落在一英亩的土地上,因而后院地方很大,可供我们辟为花园.

sentences.en: Such beds should reduce travelling distance per acre.
sentences.cn: 这种带状栽植能减少单位面积的周转距离.

sentences.en: The 77,000-acre estate contains five of the highest peaks in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 7.7万英亩的私人土地上有5座苏格兰最高的山峰。

sentences.en: The acre of garden is host to a splendid bank of rhododendrons.
sentences.cn: 一英亩见方的花园生长出一大片绚烂的杜鹃花.

sentences.en: The men were mowing hay in the South Acre.
The optimum density is difficult to specify in terms of trees per acre.
sentences.cn: 很难定论究竟每英亩多少株树为最适密度.

sentences.en: The playground covers over an acre in extent.
sentences.cn: 操场的面积超过一英亩.

sentences.en: The shepherd has penned up the sheep in the five - acre field.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人把羊群围在那块五英亩的土地上.

sentences.en: The shephers has penned up the sheep in the five acre field.
sentences.cn: 牧羊人把羊群围在那块5英亩的土地上.

sentences.en: They ended up buying a prebuilt modular home on a two-acre lot.
sentences.cn: 最后他们购买了一幢建在两英亩土地上的预制组合式房屋。

sentences.en: They have lifted water from the Yellow River onto the high land and reaped a good cotton harvest on a 300 - acre tract.
sentences.cn: 他们把黄河水引上高原,使300公亩棉田获得丰收.

sentences.en: They measured off a half - acre plot for a house lot.
sentences.cn: 他们划出一块半英亩的地皮来作房屋地基.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,840 square yards or 4,047 square metres
